title: >:( The Perfect Harrowing Skin Now Riot D:
body:
**Gravelord Azir**
http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/Azir_Splash_2-1024x604.jpg
Was it too much to have done this for harrowing :(

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We felt that Gravelord Azir didn't fit in well with the Zombie/Slayer skins you saw for this patch. That said, we didn't want to scrap the idea or push him a year out for the next event, which is why you're seeing him a patch later. :]

As Pyrodinium also mentioned, this means Gravelord Azir isn't legacy, which means he'll still have two skins available at all times.

Still don't understand why you thought Zombie/Slayer was such a cool and unique thing that you had to focus the entire harrowing around it.

Would have been really cool to have themed skins for Shadow and Fortune.

Yeah, let's delay THE perfect harrowing skin for junkyard Jinx and Pantheon and a Nunu skin that could have come out any time of the year too. Makes sense.

And who said all Harrowing skins had to be legacy anyway?
No one said they have to be. In fact, not all Harrowing skins have been legacy in the past. I was just pointing it out again since someone else had mentioned it.
Yes it is a good Harrowing skin, which is not bound by any seasonal event. Now if you said the proper term Halloween, then this entire thread would at least be going somewhere.
They did for last year. The year before that was costumes, this year they wanted to do zombies.

I think that the problem is that the "Slayer" skins dont fit well in the Harrowing theme.

Just like that Officer Vi.

Dressing up as a sexy version of something is a Halloween tradition, so there's that.

 Zombies are just... zombies. zzz.

Harrowing skins are Legacy.

Given that Azir has only one skin as of today, limiting this skin to just a couple of weeks would have been asinine.
